articles.title: Israel protests: PM Netanyahu delays legal reforms after day of strikes - BBC
articles.description: His proposed changes provoked an outpouring of anger from nearly all parts of Israeli society.
articles.content:
An uneasy calm is returning to Israel after Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu announced he would delay a key part of controversial plans to overhaul the justice system.

articles.title: Scientists discover water inside tiny beads of glass on moon - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Analysis of lunar soil samples shows spheres of glass hold water inside them, scientists have said.
articles.content: Scientists say they have discovered water trapped inside tiny beads of glass scattered across the moon, suggesting a potential reservoir of this precious resource for future human activities on the l… [+2962 chars]

articles.title: Scientists retract photo of 'first goblin shark seen in the Med' as it could actually show a TOY - Daily Mail
articles.description: Scientists from the University of Patras and University of Aberdeen retracted their photo of a goblin shark washed up on Anafi Island after social media users found it looked like a toy replica.
articles.content:
Marine biologists have been forced to embarrassingly retract the so-called 'first record of the goblin shark' seen in the Mediterranean Sea.
This came after social media users pointed out that the p… [+7359 chars]
